title: Setting SMART Goals for Success (效率/工作)
english: Simply having a goal, like 'I want to be successful,' is often too vague to be actionable. To truly achieve your professional or personal objectives, you need to set **SMART goals**.
SMART is an acronym that stands for Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, and Time-bound. This framework turns abstract dreams into clear roadmaps.

For example, instead of 'I want to write a book,' a SMART goal would be: 'I will write the first draft of my novel (Specific) by completing 500 words every day (Measurable, Achievable) over the next six months (Time-bound). This goal is Relevant to my long-term career aspirations.'

By defining your goals with these five criteria, you gain clarity, focus, and motivation. You can track your progress easily and adjust your approach when necessary, leading to a much higher rate of success.
chinese: 仅仅拥有一个目标，比如“我想成功”，通常过于模糊而无法付诸行动。要真正实现你的职业或个人目标，你需要设定 **SMART 目标**。
SMART 是一个首字母缩略词，代表具体（Specific）、可衡量（Measurable）、可实现（Achievable）、相关（Relevant）和有时限（Time-bound）。这个框架将抽象的梦想变成了清晰的路线图。
例如，一个 SMART 目标不是“我想写一本书”，而是：“我将在接下来的六个月内（有时限），通过每天完成 500 个单词（可衡量、可实现），来写完我的小说初稿（具体）。这个目标与我长期的职业抱负是相关的（相关）。”
通过用这五个标准来定义你的目标，你可以获得清晰度、专注力和动力。你可以轻松地跟踪你的进度，并在必要时调整你的方法，从而获得更高的成功率。

vocabulary.meaning: adj. 可操作的，可付诸行动的
n. 标准，准则（criterion 的复数）
